description: Functions with parameter validation, type checking, and business rule validation

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="validateEmail" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="true" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Throws validation error if email format is invalid

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="setUserAge" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="age" type="number" required="true" min="0" max="120" />
  <q:return value="UPDATE users SET age = {age}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates age is in valid range before updating

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="registerUser" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="cpf" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="INSERT INTO users (cpf, name) VALUES ({cpf}, {name})" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates CPF format and checksum before insertion

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="addWebsite" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="url" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="INSERT INTO websites (url) VALUES ({url})" />
</q:function>

<q:function name="createAccount" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="username" type="string" required="true" minLength="3" maxLength="20" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="INSERT INTO accounts (username, email) VALUES ({username}, {email})" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Applies length constraints on username before insertion

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="setPassword" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="password" type="string" required="true" minLength="8" />
  <q:return value="UPDATE users SET password_hash = HASH({password})" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates password minimum length before hashing and storing

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="registerCompany" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="cnpj" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="companyName" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="INSERT INTO companies (cnpj, name) VALUES ({cnpj}, {companyName})" />
</q:function>
